source: 尽管一些学者推测，鉴于这一文明也存在于如今已然干涸的萨拉斯瓦蒂河流域，将该文明称为“印度河-萨拉斯瓦蒂河文明”才算恰如其分，不过一些人称其为“哈拉帕文明”——得名于20世纪20年代在该区域发掘的第一个遗址“哈拉帕”。
reference: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
translation: Although some scholars suggest that the civilization was originally found in the now dry river valley of the Sahara, it was called the Indian River-Saharan civilization, because the civilization was first discovered in the Sahara in the 1920s, and the name was derived from the discovery of the first archaeological site in the Sahara in the same area, the Harappa Valley.

source: 罗马帝国的军国主义性质促进了医学的进步和发展。
reference: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.
translation: The Roman Empire's military nature promoted the development of medicine and science.

source: 奥古斯都皇帝开始招募医生，甚至组建了第一支罗马医疗队，用于战后医疗。
reference: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.
translation: Augustus began to recruit doctors and even formed the first Roman army to help after the war.

source: 外科医生对各种镇静剂都有了解，包括从罂粟种子中提取的吗啡和从莨菪种子中提取的东莨菪碱。
reference: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.
translation: The Chinese doctor has a lot of knowledge about various sedatives, including from the seeds of the cannabis plant, such as the morphine and the nicotine extracted from the plant.

source: 除了用止血带和动脉钳来阻止血液流动外，他们已能熟练通过截肢来挽救坏疽患者。
reference: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.
translation: They can now safely cut the blood vessels and arteries to stop the flow of blood.

source: 在几个世纪里，罗马帝国在医学领域取得了巨大成果，构成了我们今天所知晓的大部分知识。
reference: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.
translation: In the past, the Roman empire has made great achievements in medical science, and it is now known as the majority of our knowledge today.

source: 净土折纸，其限制规则是一次只能进行一次折叠，不允许反向折叠这样更复杂的动作，并且所有折叠的位置都必须简单明了。
reference: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.
translation: The Chinese version of the origami is that it is a single fold, which means that you cannot fold the origami paper back and forth, and all the folding positions are very simple.

source: 它是由约翰•史密斯 (John Smith) 在 20 世纪 70 年代研发的，用于帮助缺乏经验的折纸人或动手能力差的人。
reference: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.
translation: It was developed by John Smith in the late 1970s and is used by inexperienced or untrained people to help them with folding or handwriting.

source: 孩子还小的时候，就能意识到种族和种族刻板印象，这些种族刻板印象会影响其行为。
reference: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.
translation: Children can recognize racial and racial stereotypes at a very young age, which can affect their behavior.

source: 例如，如果人们模式化地认为某个少数族裔的孩子在学校表现不好，那么这些孩子一旦了解了关于自己族裔的模式化观念，他们在学校往往就有不好的表现。
reference: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.
translation: For example, if people think that a minority group of children in school are bad, then these children will be aware of the stereotype that they have about themselves as a minority group, and they will be more likely to behave in a bad way in school.

source: MySpace 是美国第三大最受欢迎的网站，目前有 5,400 万个注册帐号。
reference: MySpace is the third most popular website used in the United States and has 54 million profiles currently.
translation: MySpace is the third most popular website in the US, with 5,400,000 registered accounts.

source: 这些网站得到了很多关注，尤其是在教育领域。
reference: These websites have gotten a lot of attention, especially in the education setting.
translation: These websites have received a lot of attention in education.

source: 这些网站也有好处，比如可以轻松创建一个包含博客、视频、照片等内容的班级页面。
reference: There are positive aspects to these websites, which include, being able to easily setup a class page which can include blogs, videos, photos, and other features.
translation: These websites also have advantages, such as it is easy to create a blog, video, photos, etc. for a class.

source: 只需提供一个网址，就能轻松访问该页面。这对不会用键盘或拼写有困难的学生来说，更加容易记住，输入也更简单。
reference: This page can easily be accessed by providing just one web address, which makes it easy to remember and easy to type in for students who may have trouble using the keyboard or with spelling.
translation: Just provide a link, and you can easily access the page. For those with trouble with keyboard or spelling, it is easier to remember, and the typing is easier.

source: 它可以进行个性化设置以便阅读，也可根据需求使用或多或少的颜色。
reference: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired.
translation: It can be customized to read, or it can be used with a few colors or more.

source: “注意力缺失症“是一种神经系统综合症，三种典型的限定症状包括冲动、注意力分散、多动或精力过剩。
reference: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy".
translation: Attention Deficit Disorder is a neurological disorder that affects three main symptoms: impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or impulsivity.

source: 这不是学习能力缺失，而是学习障碍；这“影响着全美儿童的 3% 到 5%，人数可能多达 200 万”。
reference: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children".
translation: This is not a learning disability, but a learning problem; it affects 3% to 5% of the children in the United States, and it is likely to affect 200 million children.

source: 患有多动症的孩子很难专心做事，例如做作业，但他们能够集中精力做自己喜欢的事情，比如玩游戏，看喜欢的卡通片，或者写一些不加标点符号的句子。
reference: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation.
translation: Children with ADD have difficulty concentrating on things like homework, such as doing it, but they can concentrate on things they like, such as playing games, watching a favorite TV show, or writing sentences without punctuation.

source: 这些孩子往往会陷入很多麻烦。因为正常的方法无法刺激他们的大脑，为了刺激大脑，他们“做出危险行为、打架、挑战权威”。
reference: These children tend to get into a lot of trouble, because they "engage in risky behaviors, get into fights, and challenge authority" in order to stimulate their brain, since their brain can not be stimulated by normal methods.
translation: These children often end up in trouble because of the way they are taught to do things. Because of the way they are taught to do things, they "act out dangerous actions, fight with authority," and "put themselves in danger."

source: 注意力缺陷障碍（ADD）会影响患病孩童与其同龄人的关系，因为其他儿童无法理解患者做出行为、进行拼写的原因所在，也不理解为什么他们的成熟程度与众不同。
reference: ADD affects relationships with other peers because other children can not understand why they act the way that they do or why they spell they way they do or that their maturity level is different.
translation: Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD) affects the relationship between the child and his or her peers, because other children cannot understand why the child is doing what he or she is doing, and why his or her maturity level is different from the average child.

source: 当获取知识和进行学习的能力发生如上所述的变化时，获取知识的基本速率也相应地产生变化。
reference: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed.
translation: When knowledge is acquired and learned, the basic rate of knowledge acquisition also changes.

source: 获取信息的方法不尽相同。压力不再存在于个人回忆中，但回忆文本的能力变得更加重要。
reference: The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus.
translation: The information obtained is not the same as the one we have in our memory. The memory of the text is no longer a memory of individual memories, but a memory of the text's ability to be remembered.

source: 文艺复兴从根本上让学习和知识传播的方式产生了重大变化。
reference: In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
translation: The Renaissance of learning and knowledge was profoundly transformed by the introduction of the new learning and knowledge modes.

source: 原始人类与其他灵长类动物不同的地方在于，他们不再用双手移动身体、托起重物、在树林里荡来荡去。
reference: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees.
translation: The difference between primitive and modern humans is that they do not use their hands to move, lift things, or climb trees.

source: 黑猩猩手脚的大小和长度相似，这反映出手在指背行走中用来承重的事实。
reference: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking.
translation: The size and length of the hand and foot of the black bear are similar to those of a human, indicating that the bear carried weight in its forearms.

source: 人类的手比脚短，指（趾）骨更直。
reference: The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges.
translation: Human hands are shorter than the feet, and the bones are straighter.

source: 200 万到 300 万年前的手骨化石，都无不体现出手部特征，从移动方式到操作方式，经历了改变。
reference: Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.
translation: The fossil record of 200 million to 300 million years ago shows that the hand bones were not only changed in the way they moved but also in the way they handled.

source: 有些人认为，经常做人工诱导、清晰的梦会让人精疲力竭。
reference: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting.
translation: Some people think that having a clear, regular dream can make you tired.

source: 造成这种现象的主要原因是清晰的梦境延长了快速眼动状态之间的时间间隔。
reference: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states.
translation: The main cause of this phenomenon is the fact that the time between the rapid eye movements in the dream is longer than the time between the actual eye movements.

source: 每晚快速眼动期 (REM) 越短，在这种状态下睡个好觉、恢复元气的频率就越少，身体可能会出问题。
reference: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem.
translation: The shorter the REM period, the less frequent the time you get a good night's sleep, and the more likely your body is to suffer from sleep apnea.

source: 这就像每隔二三十分钟就醒来看电视那样令人筋疲力竭。
reference: This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV.
translation: This is like watching TV every few minutes.

source: 其效果取决于你的大脑每晚做清醒梦的频率。
reference: The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.
translation: Its effect depends on your brain's ability to get you to fall asleep every night.

source: 意大利人在北非的处境几乎从一开始就不甚理想。1940 年 6 月 10 日，意大利宣战后不到一周，英国第 11 轻骑兵就占领了利比亚的卡普佐堡。
reference: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya.
translation: Italian troops in the north of Africa were practically out of luck in 1940. On October 10, 1940, the 11th Hussars had taken over the city of Capuzzo, just a few days before the invasion of Britain.

source: 在巴蒂亚东部的一次伏击中，英军俘虏了意大利第十军的工程兵司令拉图西将军。
reference: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci.
translation: In a battle in the east of the city of Bardia, the British captured the commander of the Italian army, Colonel Rota.

source: 6 月 28 日，利比亚总督、墨索里尼的接班人伊塔洛·巴尔博元帅 (Marshal Italo Balbo) 在托布鲁克着陆时被友军误射致死。
reference: On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
translation: On 28 June, Marshal Italo Balbo, the governor of Libya's capital, Tripoli, was shot dead by enemy fire.

source: 现代击剑运动分为多个级别：有大学学生初步学习的级别，也有专业和奥林匹克竞技的级别。
reference: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition.
translation: Modern wrestling is divided into several levels, with the university students beginning in the basic level, and professional and Olympic competitions.

source: 这项运动主要以对决的形式进行，也就是一个击剑手与另一个击剑手进行对决。
reference: The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.
translation: This sport is played in a duel format, in which a fighter is fighting a fighter.

source: 高尔夫是一项玩家用球杆将球击入洞中的运动。
reference: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes.
translation: Golf is a game in which a player uses a club to hit the ball into the hole.

source: 常规比赛一轮要打十八洞，球员通常从球场的第一洞开始，到第十八洞结束。
reference: Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth.
translation: The regular game is played in a round-robin fashion, with the first hole usually starting at the first hole, and the last hole usually ending at the last hole.

source: 以最少击球次数或挥棒次数完成比赛的选手获胜。
reference: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins.
translation: The winner of the game is the one who hits the ball or throws the ball with the least number of strikes or blows.

source: 比赛是在草地上进行的，洞周围的草被修剪得更短，被称为果岭。
reference: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
translation: The game was played on grass, and the grass around the holes was cut shorter, called the green.

source: 也许最常见的旅游类型，也是大多数人一想到旅游就会想到的：休闲旅游。
reference: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism.
translation: The most common type of travel is probably the most common type of travel people think of when they think of travel: the vacation.

source: 这是指人们去一个与他们日常生活截然不同的地方进行放松和娱乐。
reference: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun.
translation: This is meant to be a place where people can relax and enjoy themselves.

source: 海滩、主题公园和露营地通常是休闲游客最常光顾的地方。
reference: Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists.
translation: The most common tourist attraction is the beach, theme park, and camping ground.

source: 如果一个人访问一个特定地方的目的是了解它的历史和文化，那么这种类型的旅游活动就被称为文化旅游。
reference: If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism.
translation: If a person visits a particular place for the purpose of learning its history and culture, then this type of travel activity is called a culture travel.

source: 游客可能会参观特定国家的不同地标，也可能只集中游览一个地区。
reference: Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.
translation: Travellers may visit a particular country or a specific site in a specific way.

source: 看到这种活动，殖民者也要求了增援。
reference: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements.
translation: The activity was also attended by the Chinese government and the local people.

source: 支援前沿阵地的部队包括 200 人的新罕布什尔第 1 团和第 3 团，由约翰·斯塔克上校和詹姆斯·里德上校（后来都成为了将军）指挥。
reference: Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).
translation: The support troops include 200 soldiers from the 1st and 3rd battalions, led by John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).

source: 斯塔克(Stark) 的士兵沿着殖民者阵地北端的防御围栏站位。
reference: Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position.
translation: Stark's soldiers stood along the fence north of the camp's position.

source: 退潮时，沿半岛东北部流淌的神秘河打开了一道缺口，他们迅速建起一堵短石墙，把围墙延伸到岸边北端的小海滩上。
reference: When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach.
translation: In the early morning, the mysterious river flowed through the northern part of the peninsula, opening a gap in the rock wall, and quickly built a short stone wall along the northern shore of the small beach.

source: 格里德利（Gridley）或斯塔克（Stark ）在栅栏前 100 英尺（ 30 米）处放置一根木桩，并命令在正规军经过前不许开火。
reference: Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
translation: Gridley or Stark placed a stake 100 feet (30 meters) away from the fence and ordered the soldiers to stay away from the line until the regulars passed.

source: 美国计划从三个不同的方向发动协同攻击。
reference: The American plan relied on launching coordinated attacks from three different directions.
translation: The US plans to launch three different coordinated attacks.

source: 约翰·卡德瓦德将军将向波登镇的英国守军发动一场进攻，转移敌方注意力，以阻挡任何增援部队。
reference: General John Cadwalder would launch a diversionary attack against the British garrison at Bordentown, in order to block off any reinforcements.
translation: John Cadwalder, the commander of the British garrison, will launch a general assault on the town of Bowden, to distract the enemy from their task of reinforcing the town.

source: 詹姆斯·尤因将军率 700 名民兵在特伦顿渡口渡河，占领了阿森皮克湾上的桥梁，阻断了敌军逃跑的路径。
reference: General James Ewing would take 700 militia across the river at Trenton Ferry, seize the bridge over the Assunpink Creek and prevent any enemy troops from escaping.
translation: James Evans, the commander of 700 men, led 700 men across the Tyneside Bridge, blocking the way of the enemy's retreat.

source: 2400 人的主力部队将在特伦顿 (Trenton) 以北 9 英里处渡河，然后分成两组，一组由格林 (Greene) 指挥，一组由沙利文 (Sullivan) 指挥，以便在黎明前发动进攻。
reference: The main assault force of 2,400 men would cross the river nine miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one under Greene and one under Sullivan, in order to launch a pre-dawn attack.
translation: The 2400 troops will be in position to cross the river at 9 miles north of Trenton, and then split into two groups, one by Greene (Greene) and one by Sullivan (Sullivan), to advance in the morning.

source: 从四分之一英里转变为半英里的赛跑，速度变得不那么重要了，耐力成为绝对重要的因素。
reference: With the change from the quarter to the half mile run, speed becomes of much less importance and endurance becomes an absolute necessity.
translation: From quarter mile to half mile, speed becomes less important, and strength becomes the absolute key factor.

source: 当然，要成为一流的半英里跑步选手（在两分钟内跑完），就必须要有足够快的速度，并且要不惜一切代价地培养耐力。
reference: Of course a first-class half-miler, a man who can beat two minutes, must be possessed of a fair amount of speed, but endurance must be cultivated at all hazards.
translation: Yes, it is necessary to be a great half-mile runner (in two minutes) to be a great half-mile runner, and to be able to do so, you must have a very fast pace, and you must be willing to sacrifice your strength.

source: 在冬季练练越野跑，加上对上半身的健身锻炼，能为跑步季做好充分准备。
reference: Some cross country running during the winter, combined with gymnasium work for the upper part of the body, is the best preparation for the running season.
translation: In winter, run a few laps of the track, and then add some cardio exercises to your running routine.

source: 仅靠适当的营养实践并不足以造就出色表现，但这可以显著影响年轻运动员的整体健康状况。
reference: Proper nutritional practices alone cannot generate elite performances, but they can significantly affect young athletes' overall wellness.
translation: Chinese：营养实践不足，但可以显著影响年轻运动员的整体健康状况。

source: 保持健康的能量平衡，坚持有效补充水分的习惯，了解合理使用营养补品的各个方面，能够帮助运动员们改善表现，增加运动乐趣。
reference: Maintaining a healthy energy balance, practicing effective hydration habits, and understanding the various aspects of supplementation practices can help athletes improve their performance and increase their enjoyment of the sport.
translation: Keep healthy energy balance, stick to a healthy water intake, know the different aspects of nutrition, and know how to use the right supplements, which can help athletes improve performance, increase enjoyment of exercise.

source: 中长跑是一项花费相对低廉的运动；然而参与者对所需的几件装备却有很多误解。
reference: Middle distance running is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, there are many misconceptions regarding the few pieces of equipment required to participate.
translation: The long run is a relatively inexpensive sport; however, the participants have a lot of misconceptions about what they need.

source: 可以根据需要购买产品，但大多数产品对成绩几乎没有实际影响。
reference: Products can be purchased as needed, but most will have little or no real impact on performance.
translation: Products can be purchased according to the need, but most products have little or no real impact on the test score.

source: 运动员可能会认为他们倾向于一个产品，尽管这个产品毫无益处。
reference: Athletes may feel that they prefer a product even when it provides no real benefits.
translation: Athletes may think they favor a product, even though the product is not beneficial.

source: 原子可被视为是全部物质的基本组成模块之一。
reference: The atom can be considered to be one of the fundamental building blocks of all matter.
translation: The atom is the basic unit of all matter.

source: 根据简化的波尔模型显示，这是一个非常复杂的实体，包含了一个由电子环绕的中心原子核，这些电子有点像绕着太阳运行的行星。详见图 1.1。
reference: Its a very complex entity which consists, according to a simplified Bohr model, of a central nucleus orbited by electrons, somewhat similar to planets orbiting the sun - see Figure 1.1.
translation: According to simplified models, this is a very complex entity, which contains a central atom, surrounded by a very dense electron cloud, which is like a planet orbiting the sun. The detailed picture 1.1 shows.

source: 原子核由中子和质子这两种粒子组成。
reference: The nucleus consists of two particles - neutrons and protons.
translation: The nucleus consists of two particles, neutrons and protons.

source: 质子带有正电，中子不带电。电子带有负电。
reference: Protons have a positive electric charge while neutrons have no charge. The electrons have a negative electric charge.
translation: The protons have positive charges, the neutrons have no charges. Electrons have no charges.

source: 要检查受害者，你必须先勘察现场，确保自身的安全。
reference: To Check the victim, you must first survey the scene to ensure your safety.
translation: Check the victim, you must first inspect the scene, ensure your safety.

source: 靠近受害者时，需要注意其姿势和任何无意识的危险信号。
reference: You need to notice the victim's position as you approach him or her and any automatic red flags.
translation: Watch for any signs of danger and any unintentional movements.

source: 如果你想帮助别人时受伤，你只会使事情变得更糟。
reference: If you get hurt trying to help, you may only serve to make matters worse.
translation: If you want to help someone, you only make things worse.

source: 研究发现，抑郁、恐惧以及把病情灾难化的情绪，在腰疼患者的疼痛和残疾中起到了中介作用。
reference: The study found that depression, fear and catastrophising mediated the relationship between pain and disability in lower back pain sufferers.
translation: The study found that depression, fear, and catastrophizing mediated the relationship between pain and disability in the pain and disability of the patients.

source: 只有杞人忧天思维的影响，而不是沮丧和恐惧的影响，才能有条件地每周定期进行结构性体育锻炼。
reference: Only the effects of catastrophizing, not depression and fear was conditional of regular weekly structured PA sessions.
translation: Only the influence of optimism, not pessimism and fear, can be sustained for a period of time.

source: 参与定期训练的人在对疼痛的被动感知方面需要更多支持，以帮助他们区分慢性疼痛和不适感与正常身体运动的区别。
reference: Those participating in regular activity required more support in terms of negative perception of pain distinguishing the differences of chronic pain and discomfort feel from normal physical movement.
translation: The participants in regular training need to be more supportive of their pain perception, helping them distinguish between chronic pain and normal physical movement.

source: 视觉或看的能力依赖于视觉系统的感觉器官，即眼睛。
reference: Vision, or the ability to see depends on visual system sensory organs or eyes.
translation: Vision or sight depends on the visual system, which is the sense of sight.

source: 眼睛的构造有许多种，其复杂程度取决于生物体的需要。
reference: There are many different constructions of eyes, ranging in complexity depending on the requirements of the organism.
translation: The structure of the eyes is very complex, depending on the needs of the organism.

source: 不同的构造有不同的功能，对不同的波长敏感，且敏锐度不同。它们也需要不同的处理方式来理解输入，并需要不同数量的输入才能达到最佳效果。
reference: The different constructions have different capabilities, are sensitive to different wave-lengths and have differing degrees of acuity, also they require different processing to make sense of the input and different numbers to work optimally.
translation: Different constructions have different functions, and different wavelengths are sensitive to different amounts of light, and different amounts of light can be absorbed by different constructions.

source: 种群是指在特定地理区域内特定种类生物体的集合。
reference: A population is the collection of organisms of a particular species within a given geographic area.
translation: Populations are the collection of organisms in a particular geographic area.

source: 当种群中的所有个体在某一特定表型性状上完全相同时，就称之为单型。
reference: When all individuals in a population are identical with regard to a particular phenotypic trait they are known as monomorphic.
translation: When all individuals in a population are in a particular trait that is completely shared by all individuals, it is called a single trait.

source: 当个体表现出某一性状的几个变体时，它们就是多态的。
reference: When the individuals show several variants of a particular trait they are polymorphic.
translation: When individuals show a particular trait, they are polymorphic.

source: 行军蚁群的行进和筑巢也分不同的阶段。
reference: Army ant colonies march and nest in different phases as well.
translation: The marching ant colonies march and nest in different phases.

source: 在迁徙阶段，行军蚁在夜间出行，白天停下来安营。
reference: In the nomadic phase, army ants march at night and stop to camp during the day.
translation: In migration, the army ants travel in the night and stop for rest in the day.

source: 当可利用的食物减少时，这个蚁群就会迎来迁徙期。在这一阶段，蚁群会建造每天更换的临时巢穴。
reference: The colony begins a nomadic phase when available food has decreased. During this phase, the colony makes temporary nests that are changed everyday.
translation: When food becomes available, the colony will start to migrate. This stage is when the colony will build new temporary nests every day.

source: 这种游牧性的横冲直撞行为每次都会持续 17 天左右。
reference: Each of these nomadic rampages or marches lasts for approximately 17 days.
translation: This behavior is repeated every 17 days.

source: 什么是细胞？“细胞”一词来源于拉丁语“cella”，意思是“小房间”，最初是由观察软木结构的显微镜学家创造的。
reference: What is a cell? The word cell comes from the Latin word "cella", meaning "small room", and it was first coined by a microscopist observing the structure of cork.
translation: What is a cell? The word "cell" comes from the Latin word "cella", meaning a small room, originally derived from the observation of the microscopic structure of soft wood.

source: 细胞是所有生物的基本构成单位，所有生物体都是由一个或多个细胞构成的。
reference: The cell is the basic unit of all living things, and all organisms are composed of one or more cells.
translation: Cell is the basic unit of all living things, and all living things are made up of a single or a few cells.

source: 实际上，细胞在生物研究中有着如此基础和关键的地位，以至于它们常被称为“生命的基本单位”。
reference: Cells are so basic and critical to the study of life, in fact, that they are often referred to as "the building blocks of life".
translation: Actually, the cell is so basic and crucial to the study of life that they are often referred to as "the basic unit of life".

source: 神经系统通过向全身发送神经脉冲来保持血液流动顺畅，从而维持体内平衡。
reference: The Nervous System maintains homeostasis by sending nerve impulses through out the body to keep the flow of blood going as well as undisturbed.
translation: The nervous system maintains the flow of blood by sending nerve impulses throughout the body to keep it flowing smoothly.

source: 这些神经脉冲可以非常迅速地传送到全身，让身体免受任何潜在威胁的伤害。
reference: These nerve impulses can be sent so quickly throughout the body which helps keep the body safe from any potential threat.
translation: These nerve impulses can be very quickly transmitted throughout the body, which can help the body avoid any potential danger.

source: 与其他猛烈的风暴相比，龙卷风袭击的区域较小，但可以摧毁途经的一切。
reference: Tornadoes strike a small area compared to other violent storms, but they can destroy everything in their path.
translation: The storm was smaller than other storms, but it could destroy everything in its path.

source: 龙卷风能将树木连根拔起，将建筑物上的木板撕下，把汽车抛向天空。龙卷风中的百分之二最为猛烈，能持续肆虐三小时以上。
reference: Tornadoes uproot trees, rip boards from buildings, and fling cars up into the sky. The most violent two percent of tornadoes last more than three hours.
translation: The wind can tear trees down, break down the roof of buildings, and throw cars into the sky. The wind of the second most powerful class is as strong as a tornado, lasting for three hours.

source: 这些怪物般的风暴，风速高达每小时 480 公里（133 m/s; 300 mph）。
reference: These monster storms have winds up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).
translation: These monster-like storms, with winds of up to 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph), are threatening to blow across the country.

source: 几千年来，人类一直在制作和使用放大镜。
reference: Humans have been making and using lenses for magnification for thousands and thousands of years.
translation: Humans have been making and using magnifying glasses for centuries.

source: 然而，第一个真正的望远镜是 16 世纪晚期在欧洲制造的。
reference: However, the first true telescopes were made in Europe in the late 16th century.
translation: However, the first true telescope was made in Europe in the late 16th century.

source: 这些望远镜使用了两个透镜的组合，使远处的物体看起来既近又大。
reference: These telescopes used a combination of two lenses to make distant objects appear both nearer and larger.
translation: These telescopes were made of two lenses, which made the distant objects appear to be very close and large.

source: 贪婪和自私永远与我们同在，合作的本质就是当大多数人受益时，短期的自私行为总能带来更多利益
reference: Greed and selfishness will always be with us and it is the nature of cooperation that when the majority benefit there will always be more to gain in the short term by acting selfishly
translation: The essence of cooperation is mutual benefiting, and the basic principle of cooperation is to maximize the benefits of cooperation when all the parties benefit from it

source: 希望大多数人都能意识到，从长远来看，与他人合作才是最佳选择。
reference: Hopefully, most people will realise that their long term best option is to work together with others.
translation: I hope that most people realize that cooperation with others is the best option for the long term.

source: 许多人梦想着人类有一天可以移民到其他星球，探索其他世界。有些人想知道宇宙有什么；有些人相信其他行星上可能有外星人或其他生命。
reference: Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant.
translation: Many people dream of a day when humans can travel to other planets, explore other worlds. Some people believe that there are other planets with life; others believe that there may be other life on other planets.

source: 但如果这种情况真的发生了，那么它很可能在很长一段时间内都不会再发生了。这些恒星非常分散，“相邻”的恒星相隔数万亿英里。
reference: But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are "neighbors".
translation: But if this happens, it will probably never happen again. The stars are so far apart that they are thousands of billions of miles apart.

source: 也许有一天，你的子孙后代会生活在外星世界，猜测着他们远古的祖先当时过得是怎样的一种生活。
reference: Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?
translation: Maybe one day, your children will live in an alien world, wondering what their ancestors were like.

source: 动物由许多细胞组成。动物吃了食物后会在体内将其消化。大部分动物都能移动。
reference: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move.
translation: Animals are made up of many cells. Animals eat food and move around in their bodies. Most animals can move.

source: 只有动物有脑（但也不是所有动物都有，比如水母就没有脑）。
reference: Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains).
translation: Only animals have brains (though not all animals have, like the sea snail doesn't have brains).

source: 地球上的各个角落都有动物的身影。它们有的在地下挖洞，有的在海洋中畅游，有的在天空中翱翔。
reference: Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.
translation: The earth has a lot of animals. Some are underground, some swim in the sea, some fly in the sky.

source: 细胞是各类生物体中最小的结构和功能单位。
reference: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism.
translation: Cell is the smallest structural and functional unit in all living organisms.

source: Cell（细胞）一词源自拉丁语cella（意思是小房间）。
reference: Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room.
translation: Cell (cells) is a Latin word for a small room.

source: 在显微镜下观察生物，你会发现它们是由小方块或小球组成的。
reference: If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls.
translation: In a microscope, you will see that the organisms are made up of small squares or balls.

source: 来自英国的生物学家罗伯特·胡克 (Robert Hooke) 用显微镜看到了软木塞中藏有一些小方块。
reference: Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope.
translation: Robert Hooke, a British biologist, observed that some small squares in the softwood were contained in the tiny balls of the worm.

source: 它们看上去像房间。他是第一个观察死亡细胞的人
reference: They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
translation: They look like rooms. He was the first to observe the death of cells.

source: 元素和化合物可以在发生化学变化的情况下改变物态。
reference: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change.
translation: Elements and compounds can change their state in the presence of chemical changes.

source: 气态氮仍具有与液态氮相同的性质。液态氮的密度更大，但是分子还是一样的。
reference: Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same.
translation: The same as in Chinese，气态氮仍然具有与液态氮相同的性质。液态氮的密度更大，但是分子还是是一样的。

source: 另一个例子是水。化合物水是由两个氢原子和一个氧原子组成的。
reference: Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.
translation: Another example is water. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom.

source: 无论是气体、液体还是固体，它的分子结构都是一样的。
reference: It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid.
translation: The same molecular structure is present in all gases, liquids, and solids.

source: 虽然它的物理状态可能会改变，但化学状态保持不变。
reference: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
translation: Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

source: 时间就在我们身边，影响着我们做的每一件事，但却很难理解。
reference: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand.
translation: Time is in our lives, and affects us in every way, but it is difficult to understand.

source: 数千年来，时间一直是宗教、哲学和科学学者的研究对象。
reference: Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.
translation: Time has been a subject of study for religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years.

source: 我们所经历的时间是一系列从未来到现在再到过去的事件。
reference: We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past.
translation: The time we are dealing with is a series of events from the future to the present and back to the past.

source: 时间也是我们用来比较事件持续时间（长度）的方式。
reference: Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events.
translation: Time is also a way of comparing the duration of events (length).

source: 你可以通过观察重复的周期性事件来记录时间的流逝。周期性事件是指有规律地一次又一次发生的事。
reference: You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
translation: You can record the time by observing the repetition of periodic events. Periodic events are events that happen periodically.

source: 今天，我们使用计算机处理图片和视频。
reference: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos.
translation: Today, we use computers to process pictures and videos.

source: 复杂的动画可以在计算机上构建，这种类型的动画正越来越多地应用于电视和电影。
reference: Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films.
translation: Animated text can be created in computers, and this type of text is increasingly being used in television and film.

source: 录制音乐时往往用复杂的计算机来处理，并把声音混合在一起。
reference: Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
translation: The recording process often involves complicated computers and mixing sounds together.

source: 在十九世纪和二十世纪很长一段时间，人们都认为新西兰的第一批居民是毛利人，他们猎取一种称为恐鸟的大型鸟类。
reference: For a long time during the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, it was believed the first inhabitants of New Zealand were the Maori people, who hunted giant birds called moas.
translation: In the 19th and 20th centuries, people thought that the first settlers of New Zealand were the Maori, who hunted large birds known as the "kitnips".

source: 然后该理论确立了这样一种观点：毛利人从波利尼西亚乘“大船”迁移，并从莫里奥里人手中夺取了新西兰，建立了一个农业社会。
reference: The theory then established the idea that the Maori people migrated from Polynesia in a Great Fleet and took New Zealand from the Moriori, establishing an agricultural society.
translation: The theory then developed: The people of Polynesia migrated to the islands of Maui, and from the Moriori took control of New Zealand, establishing a society of agriculture.

source: 但有新的证据表明，莫里奥里人属于大陆毛利人族群，他们从新西兰移居到查塔姆群岛，发展出了自己独特的崇尚和平的文化。
reference: However, new evidence suggests that the Moriori were a group of mainland Maori who migrated from New Zealand to the Chatham Islands, developing their own distinctive, peaceful culture.
translation: But new evidence suggests that the Maori are a distinct group from the mainland Maori, who migrated to the islands of New Zealand and settled in the coastal areas of the Chatham Islands, developing a unique culture of peace.

source: 查塔姆群岛上还有另一个部落，他们是从新西兰移民过来的毛利人。
reference: There was also another tribe on the Chatham islands these were Maori who migrated away from New Zealand.
translation: The Chatham Islands are also inhabited by another tribe, the Maori, who migrated from New Zealand.

source: 他们自称莫里奥里人。发生过一些小冲突，最后莫里奥里人被消灭了
reference: They called themselves the Moriori there were a few skirmishes and in the end, the Moriori were wiped out
translation: They are called Moriori. They have had some small fights, but the Moriori were exterminated.

source: 参与了几十年的人士帮助我们认识到自己的长处和热情所在，同时坦诚地评估困难，甚至是失败。
reference: Individuals who had been involved for several decades helped us appreciate our strengths and passions while candidly assessing difficulties and even failures.
translation: People have helped us realize our strengths and passions, and we have learned to evaluate ourselves and our failures with sincerity.

source: 在听取别人分享他们个人、家庭和组织的故事时，我们对过去以及一些对组织文化有或好或坏影响的人物有了宝贵的认识。
reference: While listening to individuals share their individual, family, and organizational stories, we gained valuable insight into the past and some of the personalities who influenced for good or ill the culture of the organization.
translation: In listening to others share their personal, family, and organizational stories, we have gained valuable insight into past and some of the people who have had a positive or negative impact on the culture of the organization.

source: 虽然理解历史并不意味着理解文化，但至少可以帮助人们了解自己在组织历史中的位置。
reference: While understanding one’s history does not assume understanding of culture, it does at least help people gain a sense of where they fall within the history of the organization.
translation: Although understanding history does not mean understanding culture, it can help people understand their position in the organization's history.

source: 在总结成功和失败时，个人和所有参与者会对组织的价值观、使命和驱动力有更深刻的认识。
reference: While assessing the successes and becoming aware of failures, individuals and the whole of the participating persons discover more deeply the values, mission, and driving forces of the organization.
translation: In the conclusion of success and failure, individuals and all participants will have a deeper understanding of the organization's values, mission, and motivation.

source: 在这种情况下，回顾之前的创业行为和取得的成功可以帮助人们对当地教会的新变化和新方向保持开放的态度。
reference: In this instance, recalling previous instances of entrepreneurial behavior and resulting successes helped people to be open to new changes and new direction for the local church.
translation: In this case, the previous entrepreneurial behavior and successes can help people keep open their attitude to the local church's new changes and new direction.

source: 这样的成功故事让人们对变化的恐惧感减轻了，同时为未来的变革营造出正面的倾向。
reference: Such success stories lessened the fears of change, while creating positive inclinations toward change in the future.
translation: Such success stories have made people less afraid of change, and have created a positive attitude toward change.

source: 收敛思维模式是通过结合不同的想法或领域来寻找解决方案的问题解决技巧。
reference: Convergent thinking patterns are problem solving techniques that unite different ideas or fields to find a solution.
translation: The concept of thinking in a dialectical manner is to find a solution to a problem by combining different ideas or fields.

source: 这种思维模式看重的是速度、逻辑和准确性，还有甄别事实、对现有技术的重新应用和信息收集。
reference: The focus of this mindset is speed, logic and accuracy, also identification of facts, reapplying existing techniques, gathering information.
translation: This thinking style emphasizes speed, logic, and accuracy, and also the ability to refine facts, to apply existing technologies, and to gather information.

source: 这种思维模式最重要的因素是：正确答案只有一个。你只需考虑两个答案，即对的或者是错的。
reference: The most important factor of this mindset is: there is only one correct answer. You only think of two answers, namely right or wrong.
translation: This mindset is the most important factor in this way: The only answer you have to think about is the right one. You only have to think about two answers, either right or wrong.

source: 这种思维模式与某些科学或标准程序不无关联。
reference: This type of thinking is associated with certain science or standard procedures.
translation: This mentality is related to certain scientific or standard procedures.

source: 这种思维类型的人具有逻辑思维，能够记得住模式、解决问题，还能进行科学测试。
reference: People with this type of thinking have logical thinking, are able to memorize patterns, solve problems and work on scientific tests.
translation: This type of thinking is characterized by logic, it can remember patterns, solve problems, and can also perform scientific tests.

source: 到目前为止，人类是最善于读懂他人心思的物种。
reference: Humans are by far the most talented species in reading the minds of others.
translation: Human beings are the most capable species to understand others' minds.

source: 这意味着我们能够成功地预测其他人的感知、意图、信仰、知识或欲望。
reference: That means we are able to successfully predict what other humans perceive, intend, believe, know or desire.
translation: This means that we can successfully predict the perceptions, intentions, beliefs, knowledge or desires of others.

source: 在这些能力中，理解他人意图至关重要。我们可以凭借这一能力理解身体行为可能表达出的模棱两可的问题。
reference: Among these abilities, understanding the intention of others is crucial. It allows us to resolve possible ambiguities of physical actions.
translation: In these abilities, understanding others' intentions is crucial. We can rely on this ability to understand body language that may be expressed in ambiguous ways.

source: 例如，如果你看到有人打破车窗，你很有可能会认为这个人在偷陌生人的汽车。
reference: For example, if you were to see someone breaking a car window, you would probably assume he was trying to steal a stranger’s car.
translation: For example, if you see someone breaking the window of a car, you may think this person is trying to steal the car of an unknown stranger.

source: 如果他是丢了车钥匙，试图打开自己汽车的车门的话，那可能就要另当别论了。
reference: He would need to be judged differently if he had lost his car keys and it was his own car that he was trying to break into.
translation: If he tries to open his car door, he may have to wait for another car.

source: 磁共振成像依据的是一种叫核磁共振 (NMR) 的物理现象，它是费利克斯·布洛赫（在斯坦福大学工作）和爱德华·珀塞耳（来自哈佛大学）于 20 世纪 30 年代发现的。
reference: MRI is based on a physics phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which was discovered in the 1930s by Felix Bloch (working at Stanford University) and Edward Purcell (from Harvard University).
translation: MRI is based on a phenomenon called nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), which is discovered by Felix Bloch in the late 1930s and Edward Purcell in the early 1940s.

source: 在这种共振中，磁场和无线电波导致原子发出微弱的无线电信号。
reference: In this resonance, magnetic field and radio waves cause atoms to give off tiny radio signals.
translation: In this resonance, the magnetic field and the radio waves cause the atom to emit a tiny radio signal.

source: 1970 年，医学博士兼研究科学家雷蒙德·达马迪安 (Raymond Damadian) 发现了使用磁共振成像作为医学诊断工具的基础原理。
reference: In the year 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and research scientist, discovered the basis for using magnetic resonance imaging as a tool for medical diagnosis.
translation: In 1970, Raymond Damadian, a medical doctor and researcher, discovered the basis of using MRI as a diagnostic tool for medical diagnosis.

source: 四年后，一项专利获批准，这是世界上首个颁发的核磁共振领域专利。
reference: Four years later a patent was granted, which was the world's first patent issued in the field of MRI.
translation: Four years later, a patent was granted for the first time in the field of MRI, which is the world's first patent.

source: 1977 年，达马迪安（Damadian）博士完成了第一台 “全身” 核磁共振扫描仪的制造，他称之为 “不屈号”。
reference: In 1977, Dr. Damadian completed the construction of the first “whole-body” MRI scanner, which he called the ”Indomitable”.
translation: In 1977, Dr Damadian developed the first "whole-body" MRI scanner, which he called the "unswept".

source: 异步通讯让人们有时间思考他人的反应并作出反应。
reference: Asynchronous communication encourages time for reflection and reaction to others.
translation: Synchronous communication allows people to think about others' reaction and react accordingly.

source: 这让学生能够按自己的节奏学习，并控制传授教学信息的节奏。
reference: It allows students the ability to work at their own pace and control the pace of instructional information.
translation: This allows students to control the pace of learning and the pace of instruction.

source: 此外，由于可以实行弹性工作时间，时间上的限制也比较少。（布雷默，1998年）
reference: In addition, there are fewer time restrictions with the possibility of flexible working hours. (Bremer, 1998)
translation: Also, the time limit is less for flexible work, as time is more flexible. (Bremer, 1998)

source: 学习者可以使用互联网和万维网随时获取信息。
reference: The use of the Internet and the World Wide Web allows learners to have access to information at all times.
translation: The learner can access information online and in the form of a web browser.

source: 学生也可以在一天中的任何时间把问题提交给老师，并且可以预期得到合理时间内的快速回复，而不用一直等到下一次面谈。
reference: Students can also submit questions to instructors at any time of day and expect reasonably quick responses, rather than waiting until the next face-to-face meeting.
translation: Students can also submit their questions to the teacher in any time of the day and expect a quick response, without having to wait for the next meeting.

source: 后现代主义学习方法给人带来绝对的自由。并没有一种学习方法是好的学习方法。
reference: The postmodern approach to learning offers the freedom from absolutes. There is no one good way to learn.
translation: Modernist learning methods are free from absolutes of learning. There is no one method of learning is better than another.

source: 事实上，没有任何事情需要特意学习。在学习者体验到知识呈现的时候，学习的行为就发生了。
reference: In fact, there is not one good thing to learn.Learning takes place in the experience between the learner and the knowledge presented.
translation: Actually, there is no need to learn anything. When the learner experiences the knowledge presented, the learning process happens.

source: 目前我们对所有以 DIY 、展示信息以及以学习为主要内容的电视节目的体验，都说明了这一点。
reference: Our current experience with all the do-it-yourself and information presenting, learning-based television shows illustrates this point.
translation: At the moment , we have all the experience we have in the development of DIY , the information and learning , and the main focus of the TV program .

source: 我们中有很多人，都发现自己观看的电视节目在告诉我们某种过程或经验，但我们却永远不会参与或应用这些知识。
reference: So many of us find ourselves watching a television show that informs us of a process or experience in which we will never participate or apply that knowledge.
translation: We have many people, we are aware of the fact that our TV shows tell us something about a process or experience, but we never apply or use these knowledge.

source: 我们永远不会对汽车进行大修，不会在后院建喷泉，不会去秘鲁考察古代遗迹，也不会改造邻居的房子。
reference: We will never overhaul a car, build a fountain in our backyard, travel to Peru to examine ancient ruins, or remodel our neighbour's house.
translation: We never repair cars, don't build a swimming pool in the backyard, don't visit Peru, don't remodel the neighbors' houses, and don't build a new car in our neighborhood.

source: 多亏有了与欧洲相连的海底光缆和宽带卫星，格陵兰网络连接畅通，93% 的人口接入了互联网。
reference: Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access.
translation: Thanks to the cable and satellite links between Europe and Greenland, the network is very well connected, 93% of the population has access to the Internet.

source: 你的酒店或房东（如果住在民宿或私人民宅）可能配有 wifi 或可联网的电脑。所有安置点都有一家网吧或有公共 wifi 的地方。
reference: Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi.
translation: Your hotel or host (if you live in a guest house or a private home) may have wifi or a computer connected to the internet. All accommodation has a wifi or a computer in the room.

source: 正如上文所提，虽然“爱斯基摩人”这个词在美国仍然可以接受，但北极地区的许多非美籍人士，尤其是对加拿大人来说，他们都认为这个词带有贬义含义。
reference: As mentioned above, though the word "Eskimo" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada.
translation: As noted above, although the term "Eskimo" is still acceptable in the United States, many non-U.S. Eskimo people, especially in Canada, consider the term to be offensive.

source: 尽管你可能会听到格陵兰本地人用这个词，但外国人应该避免使用。
reference: While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners.
translation: Although you may hear the term used in Greenland, foreigners should avoid using it.

source: 在加拿大，格陵兰岛的土著居民称自己为因纽特人，在格陵兰岛则称自己为 Kalaalleq（复数为 Kalaallit），也就是“格陵兰人”的意思。
reference: The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland.
translation: In Canada, Greenland's indigenous people call themselves the Ennuns, in Greenland Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit) is the meaning of Greenland's "people".

source: 在格陵兰岛，针对外国人的犯罪和恶意行为总体来说几乎闻所未闻。即使在城镇里，也没有 “犯罪高发区”。
reference: Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no "rough areas."
translation: In Greenland, the crime and misconduct rates are generally very low. In the towns, there is no crime or misconduct "spot".

source: 严寒也许是没有准备的人将面临的唯一真正的危险。
reference: Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face.
translation: Cold weather is the only real danger that you will face if you don't prepare for it.

source: 如果你在寒冷的季节到访格陵兰岛（记住越往北走越冷），一定要带够保暖衣物。
reference: If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing.
translation: If you visit Greenland in the winter, bring enough clothing to keep you warm.

source: 夏季漫长的白昼会导致睡眠不足和相关健康问题。
reference: The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues.
translation: The long summer nights can lead to insomnia and related health problems.

source: 在夏季，也要注意北欧的蚊子。虽然这些蚊子不会传播任何疾病，但它们可能会让人感到不适。
reference: During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating.
translation: In summer, also be aware of the mosquitos in the north. Although these mosquitos do not transmit any diseases, they can make you feel uncomfortable.

source: 旧金山的经济与自身是世界级旅游胜地这一点有关，但旧金山的经济却是多元化的。
reference: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified.
translation: San Francisco's economic and tourism position is related to its international status, but San Francisco's economic position is diversified.

source: 就业最多的部门包括专业服务业、政府、金融、贸易和旅游业。
reference: The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism.
translation: The most employed sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade and tourism.

source: 它经常出现在音乐、电影、文学和流行文化中，使得这座城市及其地标闻名于世。
reference: Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world.
translation: It is often found in music, films, literature and culture, making this city and its landmark famous.

source: 旧金山开发了一个规模庞大的旅游基础设施，内设多家酒店、餐厅和一流的会议场所。
reference: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities.
translation: San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure, including hotels, restaurants, and a large meeting venue.

source: 旧金山也是在美国品尝韩国菜、泰国菜、印度菜和日本菜等其他亚洲菜的好去处。
reference: San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
translation: San Francisco is also a good place to eat Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese food.

source: 对许多美国家庭来说，去迪斯尼乐园游玩是一场盛大的活动。
reference: Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families.
translation: For many Chinese families, visiting Disney World is a big event.

source: 这一“典型”的游玩过程包括飞往奥兰多国际机场，乘车前往迪士尼园区酒店，在迪士尼游玩大约一周的时间，然后回家。
reference: The "typical" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home.
translation: This typical travel process includes flying to Orlando International Airport, traveling to the Disney World hotel, spending a week in the Disney World, and returning home.

source: 迪士尼的玩法有无数种，但对大多数人来说，“去迪士尼乐园”就是这个意思。
reference: There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of "going to Disney World".
translation: Disney's play has a lot of different ways, but for most people, "going to Disney World" is the same.

source: 许多在 eBay 或 Craigslist 等拍卖网站上出售的门票都是部分使用过的多日通票。
reference: Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets.
translation: Many tickets sold on eBay or Craigslist are partially used tickets.

source: 虽然这是一种很常见的行为，但迪士尼却禁止这样做：门票是不可转让的。
reference: While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.
translation: Although this is a common practice, Disney has banned it, tickets are not transferable.

source: 需要获得野营许可证才可以在大峡谷边缘的下方露营。
reference: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit.
translation: The camping permit is required to camp below the edge of the Great Basin.

source: 为了保护大峡谷，许可证限量发放。按启程月份算起提前四个月，在该月的第一天开始发放。
reference: Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month.
translation: For protection of the Great Yarmouth, the permit is limited to one per person per day. The permit is issued on the first day of the month, starting on the first day of the month in advance.

source: 因此，如果启程日期为 5 月，野地露营许可证将在 1 月 1 日发放。
reference: Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan.
translation: Thus, if the date of departure is 5 March, camping permits will be issued on 1 January.

source: 最受欢迎的区域比如幽灵牧场 (Phantom Ranch) 附近的光明天使 (Bright Angel) 露营地，通常在第一天开放预订时就会收到满额预订申请。
reference: Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations.
translation: The most popular areas are the areas around Phantom Ranch (Phantom Ranch) near Bright Angel (Bright Angel) campsite, which usually open for reservation on the first day of the trip.

source: 对于未经预约的到访，许可证的预留数量有限，并按先到先得的原则提供许可证。
reference: There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
translation: For non-attendance requests, the number of permits available is limited and the first-come, first served principle applies.

source: 南部非洲非常适合开车旅行，游客既可以欣赏该地区的所有美景，又可以到达常规旅游路线之外的地方。
reference: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes.
translation: South Africa is very suitable for car travel, tourists can enjoy all the beauty of the region, and can also travel to other routes.

source: 只要细心规划，普通汽车就能做到，但强烈建议使用四驱汽车，而且许多地方只有大轴距四驱汽车才能通过。
reference: This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4.
translation: Chinese：只要细心规划，普通汽车就能做到，但强烈建议使用四驱汽车，而且许多地方只有大轴距四驱汽车才能通过。

source: 规划期间，请记住，虽然南部非洲处于稳定状态，但并非所有邻国亦然。
reference: Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are.
translation: The planning period, please remember, although South Africa is in a stable state, it does not mean all neighboring countries are.

source: 签证要求和费用因国家/地区而异，并会受到你的国籍的影响。
reference: Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.
translation: Visa requirements and costs vary from country to country and are affected by your nationality.

source: 每个国家/地区都立有专门法律，对务必放在车内的紧急物品进行了规定。
reference: Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.
translation: Each country/region has a specific law on what items are safe to put in the car.

source: 维多利亚瀑布镇是津巴布韦西部的一个小镇，与赞比亚的利文斯通接壤，靠近博茨瓦纳。
reference: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana.
translation: Victoria Falls is a small town in the western part of Zimbabwe, near the border of Botswana, and is just a few kilometres from the city of Livingstone.

source: 该镇紧邻瀑布，瀑布是主要的景点，但这个热门的旅游目的地为探险者和观光者提供了可以久住的大量机会。
reference: The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay.
translation: The town is close to the Falls, the main attraction, but the popular tourist destination is for those who want to stay for a long time and enjoy the beauty of the Falls.

source: 在雨季（11 月至 3 月），水量会更高，瀑布也更加湍急。
reference: In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic.
translation: In the rainy season (November to March), the water will be higher, and the falls will be more dramatic.

source: 如果你过桥或沿着瀑布附近蜿蜒的小径走，肯定会被弄湿。
reference: You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls.
translation: If you cross the bridge or walk along the winding paths near the falls, you will probably get wet.

source: 另一方面，恰恰因为水量太大，视线会被水挡住，看不到完整的瀑布！
reference: On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!
translation: On the other hand, because of the water's volume, the view of the fullest waterfall is obscured.

source: 图坦卡蒙墓 (KV62)。 KV62 可能是山谷中最著名的墓葬。霍华德·卡特在 1922 年发现了这位年轻国王近乎完整的皇家墓葬。
reference: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king.
translation: The tomb (KV62). KV62 is perhaps the most famous tomb in the valley. Howard Carter discovered the tomb in 1922 and discovered it almost intact.

source: 但与大多数其他皇家陵墓相比，图坦卡蒙陵墓几乎不值得参观，因为它的规模要小得多，装饰也平淡无奇。
reference: Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration.
translation: But the tomb of Tutankhamun is almost as small as most other royal tombs, because its size is smaller, the decoration is more modest, and the tomb is not very interesting.

source: 如果有人想着去看这具木乃伊从棺材中移出来时受到损坏，那么这些人可要大失所望了，因为大家只能看到木乃伊的头部和肩膀。
reference: Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible.
translation: If anyone thought that the remains of the dead were to be removed from the coffin when it was opened, they should be very disappointed, because the only thing that was visible was the head and shoulders.

source: 古墓里的巨额财富已不在墓中，而是转移到了开罗的埃及博物馆。
reference: The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.
translation: The wealth of the tomb is no longer in the tomb, but is being moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo.

source: 时间有限的游客最好选择其他去处。
reference: Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.
translation: The time limit for tourists should be limited to other places.

source: 格罗姆寺位于暹粒市西南 12 公里处。这座山顶寺庙建于 9 世纪末耶输跋摩国王统治时期。
reference: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman.
translation: The Goma temple is located 12 kilometres southwest of the capital of the province of Goma. The temple was built in the late 9th century by the king of Goma, the Yavundrupa dynasty.

source: 寺庙阴郁的氛围和洞里萨湖（Tonle Sap）的景色，让人感到爬到山顶是值得的。
reference: The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile.
translation: The atmosphere of the temple and Tonle Sap's view, combined with the view of the lake, make it worth climbing up.

source: 参观景点时，还可以顺便乘船游湖。
reference: A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.
translation: Visiting the place can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake.

source: 需要购买吴哥门票才能进入圣殿，所以前往洞里萨湖（Tonle Sap）时别忘了带上护照。
reference: The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
translation: The temple is only accessible by paying for the entrance ticket, so you should bring your passport when you go to Tonle Sap.

source: 耶路撒冷是以色列的首都和最大城市，尽管大多数的其他国家/地区和联合国都不承认耶路撒冷是以色列的首都。
reference: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital.
translation: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although most other countries and the United Nations don't recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel.

source: 坐落于犹太山丘 （Judean Hills） 上的这座古城，引人入胜的历史长达几千年之久。
reference: The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years.
translation: The city of Jerusalem is a fascinating historical city with a long history.

source: 这座城市是三大一神宗教——犹太教、基督教和伊斯兰教的圣地，是一个真正的精神、宗教和文化中心。
reference: The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center.
translation: This city is the spiritual, religious and cultural center of three major religions: Jewish, Christian and Islam.

source: 耶路撒冷（尤其是老城的许多场所）的宗教意义使这座城成为以色列主要旅游目的地之一。
reference: Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel.
translation: Jerusalem (especially the old city) is a major tourist attraction for Israel, and it is one of the main tourist destinations for the city.

source: 耶路撒冷不仅有许多历史、考古和文化遗址，还有充满活力、人头涌涌的购物中心、咖啡馆和餐馆。
reference: Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.
translation: Jerusalem has a lot of history, archaeological and cultural sites, and a lot of shopping malls, cafes, and restaurants.

source: 厄瓜多尔规定：古巴公民必须在收到邀请函后，才能通过国际机场或边境口岸进入厄瓜多尔。
reference: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points.
translation: Ecuador: The Ecuadorian government rules that citizens must be in Ecuador before entering the country by air or sea.

source: 该函必须经厄瓜多尔外交部批准，并符合某些要求。
reference: This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements.
translation: The letter must be approved by Ecuador's Embassy and comply with certain requirements.

source: 这些要求是为了在两国之间实现有条不紊的移居而设计的。
reference: These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries.
translation: These requirements are designed to ensure smooth migration between the two countries.

source: 持有美国绿卡的古巴公民应访问厄瓜多尔领事馆获得对此要求的豁免。
reference: Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement.
translation: The Cuban citizen who is eligible for green card status should visit Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain the exemption.

source: 你的护照离出发日期应至少有 6 个月，而且需要一张往返/联程机票来证明你的停留时间。
reference: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
translation: Your passport must be at least 6 months old and must have a valid travel/landing ticket to prove your stay.

source: 旅游对人数较多的旅行团来说比较便宜。如果你独自一人或只有一个朋友同行，不妨试着认识其他人，组建 4 到 6 人的旅行团，这样可以获得更优惠的人均价格。
reference: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate.
translation: Travel to a large group can be a little more expensive than to a group of friends. If you are traveling alone or with only a few friends, try to join a group of 4 to 6 people, which can give you a discount on the average price.

source: 不过，也有一点要担心的地方，因为游客经常被运过来运过去以把汽车坐满。
reference: However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars.
translation: But, there are some things to be concerned about, as tourists often get stranded on the road to get to the car.

source: 这实际上更像是一种骗人的方式，让人们以为他们必须支付更多的钱。
reference: It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.
translation: This actually makes people think they have to pay more money.

source: 高耸于马丘比丘北端的这座陡峭的山峰，常常会成为许多遗址照片的背景。
reference: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins.
translation: The peak of Mount Mecca, which rises above the city of Mecca, often becomes a backdrop for many photographs of the site.

source: 从下面往上看有点吓人，而且是陡峭而艰难的上坡路，但大多数身体状况良好的人应该能在 45 分钟内完成。
reference: It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes.
translation: From below, it looks like a steep hill and difficult climb, but most people can get there in 45 minutes.

source: 小径的大部分路段都铺设了石阶；在较陡的部分还有钢缆作为支撑的扶手。
reference: Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail.
translation: The majority of the paths are lined with stone steps; in some sections, steel cables are attached to the ground as supports.

source: 据说会让人喘不过气来，还有在陡峭的地方要小心谨慎，特别是天气潮湿时，情况有可能很快变得很危险。
reference: That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly.
translation: According to the Chinese, it will be very dangerous to breathe in the dry weather, especially in steep places, especially in the rainy season.

source: 必须穿过靠近顶部的一个很低、很狭窄的小洞。
reference: There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.
translation: The passage must be through a very narrow, very low hole.

source: 要游览加拉帕戈斯群岛的景点和野生动植物，最好的交通方式就是乘船。查尔斯·达尔文在 1835 年就是乘船游览此地的。
reference: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835.
translation: To visit the Galapagos Islands and the wildlife, the best way to get there is by boat. Charles Darwin was once a boater who went there in 1835.

source: 超过 60 艘游船在加拉帕戈斯群岛（Galapagos）水域定期往返——这些游船的体量从可承载 8 人到 100 人不等。
reference: Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers.
translation: 60 cruise ships are regularly passing through the Galapagos waters, ranging from 8 to 100 passengers.

source: 多数人很早就提前订好位置（因为船在旺季通常会客满）。
reference: Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season).
translation: Most people have already booked their seats (as the boat usually fills up during the summer).

source: 一定要确保你预订行程的代理是一位对各种船只拥有丰富知识的加拉帕戈斯群岛（Galapagos）专家。
reference: Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships.
translation: It is important that you book your trip with a knowledgeable Galapagos specialist.

source: 这能确保你的某项兴趣和/或约束条件能与最适合他们的船只相互匹配。
reference: This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
translation: This ensures that your interests and restrictions match the best possible vessel for you.

source: 在 16 世纪西班牙人到来之前，智利北部受印加统治，而土著阿拉可尼人（Araucanians）（即马普切人）则居住于智利中部和南部。
reference: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile.
translation: In the 16th century, Spanish arrived in the northern region of Chile, and the indigenous Araucanians (Araucanians) lived in the northern and southern regions of Chile.

source: 马普切人也是最后独立的美洲原住民部落之一。直到智利独立后，才完全归入西班牙语系统治者的统治下。
reference: The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence.
translation: The Mapuche also were the last remaining indigenous peoples of the Americas. Until the Chilean independence, they were completely assimilated into Spanish rule.

source: 尽管智利在1810年宣布独立（在拿破仑战争期间，西班牙在数年中没有正常运作的中央政府），但直到1818年才取得对西班牙的决定性胜利。
reference: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
translation: Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (in the Napoleonic Wars, Spain had not been functioning for a long time in the central government), it did not win the decisive victory until 1818; it did so in the same year.

source: 多米尼加共和国（西班牙语：República Dominicana）是一个加勒比国家，地处伊斯帕尼奥拉岛的东半部分，该岛分属多米尼加与海地两国
reference: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti
translation: Dominican Republic (Spanish:República Dominicana) is a country in the Caribbean region, located in the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which is part of the Dominican Republic and Haiti

source: 除了拥有白色沙滩和山地景观，该国还是美洲地区最古老的欧洲风格城市的所在地，如今成为了圣多明各的其中一部分。
reference: Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo.
translation: Besides having white beaches and mountain landscapes, the city is the oldest European city in the Americas, and now is part of Santo Domingo's cultural heritage.

source: 泰诺人 (Taínos) 和加勒比人 (Caribes) 最先来到这个岛上定居。加勒比人是讲阿拉瓦克语 (Arawakan) 的民族，大约于公元前 10000 年来到这里。
reference: The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE.
translation: The first inhabitants of the island were Taínos and Caribes, who first arrived in the island in the year 10000 B.C.

source: 在欧洲探险者到来后的短短几年里，西班牙征服者就大大削减了泰诺斯的人口
reference: Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors
translation: In the first few years after the arrival of European explorers, Spain had drastically reduced the population of the Tithonian island

source: 根据《Fray Bartolomé de las Casas》（Tratado de las Indias），1492 年至 1498 年间，西班牙侵略者杀害了约 100,000 台诺人。
reference: Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
translation: According to the Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias), 1492-1598, Spanish invaders murdered about 100,000 natives.

source: 联盟花园 (Jardín de la Unión)。这里曾是一座 17 世纪修道院的中庭，其中的圣地亚哥圣殿是唯一现存的建筑。
reference: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building.
translation: The garden (Jardín de la Unión) is a 17th-century courtyard that was once a courtyard for a convent.

source: 现在这里成为了中心广场，昼夜都热闹繁忙。
reference: It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night.
translation: Now this place is the center of the city, and it is always busy.

source: 花园周围有许多餐馆，在下午和晚上，中央凉亭经常会有免费演唱会。
reference: There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo.
translation: The garden is surrounded by many restaurants, and in the afternoon and evening, the central shade often has free concerts.

source: Callejon del Beso（亲吻小巷）。两个相隔仅 69 厘米的阳台是一个古老的爱情传说发生的地方。
reference: Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend.
translation: Callejon del Beso（亲吻小巷）。 A 69 厘米的阳台 is a story of a love story that happened in a small town.

source: 只要给一点点钱，你就能让一些孩子讲这个故事。
reference: For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
translation: If you give a little money, you can make some children tell this story.

source: 宝云岛是适合一日游或周末游的人气目的地，当地提供皮划艇、徒步旅行、商店、餐馆等旅游项目和服务。
reference: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more.
translation: The island is popular for a day trip or weekend trip, with a variety of activities and restaurants, including kayaking, hiking, shops, and restaurants.

source: 这个真正意义上的社区位于温哥华附近的豪湾，乘坐从温哥华市中心格兰维尔岛出发的定期水上出租车，就能轻松抵达。
reference: This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver.
translation: The real community of the community is in the downtown area of Vancouver, which is easy to reach by boat from Vancouver's downtown harbor.

source: 对那些喜欢户外活动的人来说，必然会徒步登上 Sea to Sky。
reference: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential.
translation: For those who enjoy outdoor activities, it is necessary to hike up the Sea to Sky.

source: 因举办了 2010 年冬奥会，惠斯勒（距温哥华 1.5 小时车程）价格高昂，但却闻名遐迩。
reference: Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
translation: The price of the 2010 Winter Olympics in Hove is high, but it is well-known around the world.

source: 在冬季，享受北美一些最好的滑雪场地；在夏季，尝试一些真正的山地自行车骑行。
reference: In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
translation: In winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in the North; in summer, try some true mountain biking.

source: 许可证必须提前预约。你必须持有许可证，才能在塞利纳过夜。
reference: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena.
translation: License must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay in San Marino, so you can stay there overnight.

source: 塞丽娜（Sirena）是唯一一个除露营之外还提供宿舍住宿和热餐的护林站。La Leona、San Pedrillo 和 Los Patos 只提供露营，不提供餐饮服务。
reference: Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service.
translation: The only other campsite that does not provide food and shelter is La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos.

source: 可以直接从希门尼斯港 (Puerto Jiménez) 的公园管理处获得入园许可，但不能使用信用卡
reference: It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards
translation: You can get a permit directly from the Puerto Jiménez Park Management Service, but you can't use a credit card.

source: 公园管理局只发出预计到访日期之前一个月以内的公园许可证。
reference: The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival.
translation: The park service only issued park permits for the first month after the anticipated arrival date.

source: CafeNet El Sol 提供预约服务，收费 30 美元，而一日通票价格为 10 美元；详情请见其 Corcovado 页面。
reference: CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
translation: CafeNet El Sol is a booking service that charges 30 dollars for a one-day pass, and 10 dollars for a two-day pass; details are provided in the Corcovado page.

source: 库克群岛是一个岛国，是新西兰的自由结合区，位于南太平洋中部的波利尼西亚。
reference: The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean.
translation: Cook Islands is a country in the South Pacific Ocean, located between the Polynesia and New Zealand.

source: 它是一个由 15 个岛屿组成的群岛，分布在 220 万平方公里的海面上。
reference: It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean.
translation: It is a group of 15 islands that are spread over 220 million square kilometres of water.

source: 由于和夏威夷处于同一时区，这些岛屿有时被认为是“南方的夏威夷”。
